result.reason: The RDP load balance info encoder incorrectly assumes char count parity equals byte count parity, causing invalid strings (odd byte count) to be passed to the ActiveX control for non-ASCII inputs.
result.approach: Update `AzureLoadBalanceInfoEncoder.cs` to check `Encoding.UTF8.GetByteCount(loadBalanceInfo) % 2` instead of `loadBalanceInfo.Length % 2` before padding. Add unit test for non-ASCII input.
